m_szDocTitle: 300% Increase In 100% Electric Car Sales In 2013 | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 300% Increase In 100% Electric Car Sales In 2013 Originally published on EV Obsession . 100% electric car sales are up about 300% in 2013 so far, while plug-in hybrid electric car sales are up about 31% for the same period. Note that Tesla doesn’t report its sales on a monthly basis — only on a quarterly basis — so my numbers for its sales are an estimate (but a pretty confident one). Also note that Fiat doesn’t report sales of the Fiat 500e at all. The year-to-date sales increase in my spreadsheet is actually about 298% for pure electric cars, but with a good estimate of the 500e thrown in, i
